page.title: 05 Housing in the Cwmbran Area
page.content:
Since Cwmbran is a new town there are many different styles of house. Much of the housing in Cwmbran is owned by the Developement Corporation, and is rented to the occupiers. These are mainly two- and three-bedroom houses and blocks of flats. Half of the children at Brookfield School live in new development and the other half live in the older houses of the old village of Cwmbran.
My Village by Matthew & Jason ----------------------------- My village is shrinking because it is beng swallowed-up by surrounding new development. It is split by a new road which has also destroyed our canal. Shops are closing and moving out to more modern accomodation. I fear that my village has been sentenced to death.
